topic.title: How to Factory Reset VTech Phones
topic.shortdesc: Before you start to provision VTech phones with , you need to reset VTech phones to factory default settings. Otherwise, Auto Provision may fail because of the previous configurations on the phone.

body.p: This guide takes VTech VSP735A running firmware 1.1.5.C as an example.

ol.li:
Find the phone IP address.
Press the Menu key when the phone is idle, navigate to Status Network on the phone.

Log in the phone web interface with your username and password.
username: admin
password: admin
Go to SERVICING Provisioning , click Reset.

Click OK to reset the phone.
The phone will be reset successfully after startup.
Do not power off during phone startup.
